works.title: This Website:
works.subtitle: Creator
works.detail: This website is written in Angular JS 2,3,4,5 as a side project for me to learn Angular JS and improve my web development skills, an area I used to be lacking at. I design the whole side and develop it by myself. The responsive aspect of this site is also manually written, instead of using the popular frameworks like bootstrap, to gain finer control and better understanding of responsive design. The animated background was created using Particle.JS.
